Medford.Patrick Slowey House: The Patrick Slowey House is an historic house at 71 Bolton Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA. It is a 1½ story wood frame structure, set on a high brick basement. The front facade is three bays wide, with a center entrance sheltered by a modest Italianate hood and accessed by a side-facing stair. The house was built in 1852 for Patrick Slowey, a laborer, and retains original elements, including its clapboard siding.
